name: Classic Margarita
description: A classic margarita made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, served with a salted rim.

name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: A refreshing strawberry smoothie made with fresh strawberries, yogurt, and honey.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee with milk and a hint of vanilla syrup, served over ice.

name: Mint Mojito
description: A refreshing mint mojito made with white rum, fresh mint leaves, lime juice, and soda water.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice served in a chilled glass.
